name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ShotEasy - Light and easy-to-use screenshot tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily capture area, or scroll page to get a long screenshot of the full page, with Beautifier and editing tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ShotEasy - Light and easy-to-use screenshot tool

ShotEasy is an online free screenshot capture tool. Not only can it quickly capture screenshots, but it also allows you to beautify and edit screenshots.

From now on, you don't have to worry about:

How to take a screenshot on Windows?
How to take a screenshot on Mac?

Screen capture and screen recording functions:

ğŸ¤– Capture full webpage screenshots, no matter how long the webpage is, it can turn the entire webpage into one image, making it easy to edit and share.
âœ‚ï¸ Selectively capture part of the screen
ğŸ‘ï¸ Capture the visible part of the screen
ğŸ“· Capture other windows on the desktop
â±ï¸ Delayed capture, for scenarios where you need to perform an action or hover the mouse to reveal a prompt before capturing
ğŸ–¼ï¸ Edit and beautify local images


TODO features:

Image annotation
Resize images, with preset size templates for various social media platforms
Shapes, circles, arrows, emojis, and various sizes of annotations
Image compression
Text to image generation, suitable for Xiaohongshu posts
Code beautification tool
Screen recording & online video editing


View details: https://shoteasy.fun/
Report issues: https://github.com/CH563/shot-easy-website/issues

*** 
ShotEasy is an online free screenshot capture tool. Not only can it quickly capture screenshots, but it also allows you to beautify and edit screenshots.

From now on, you don't have to worry about:

How to take a screenshot on Windows?
How to take a screenshot on Mac?

Screen capture and screen recording functions:

ğŸ¤– Capture full webpage screenshots, no matter how long the webpage is, it can turn the entire webpage into one image, making it easy to edit and share.
âœ‚ï¸ Selectively capture part of the screen
ğŸ‘ï¸ Capture the visible part of the screen
ğŸ“· Capture other windows on the desktop
â±ï¸ Delayed capture, for scenarios where you need to perform an action or hover the mouse to reveal a prompt before capturing
ğŸ–¼ï¸ Edit and beautify local images
